name: Colored (bom222243, NatanMP, Humane Tiger)
description:
In a hand-drawn world of Black&White, your are on a colorful journey to change things for good. By sacrificing the colors of your little Jelly hero, the world is turning into a colorful, bright and shiny place again.

To charge up your hero, and to paint more parts of the world, you have to craft paint bombs from the plants and animals of that world. The colors they give, will change their world - everything is linked, everything is JOINED TOGETHER.

INSTRUCTIONS

Use W - A - S - D to navigate your hero through the world.

Press E to bring up the crafting menu. Press E agin to close it.

Press SPACE to throw your paint bombs. They will fly in the direction of your mouse cursor.

We recommend you to play our game in Fullscreen mode (the icon is shown in the bottom right corner).

Have fun and happy coloring!
